<title level="1" right="Action">[Invigorating Fear](/Actions.aspx?ID=703) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 123 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency** once per hour

**Requirements** A creature within 60 feet gains the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition.

</column>

---

You are invigorated by the shock of a prank or the thrum of terror. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the creature's level or 3, whichever is higher. You lose any temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.
